txt.en: Adîrjan, a brute of a corsair, wanders about Belfalas murdering innocents.
You have slain Adîrjan the Brute and vanquished a threat to the safety of all that dwell within Belfalas.
You have defeated Adîrjan the Brute!
Adîrjan can be found wandering the Belgast peninsula in Belfalas.\n\nYou have encountered Adîrjan the Brute and should defeat him for the good of the people in Belfalas.
You have defeated Adîrjan the Brute.
Adîrjan can be found wandering the Belgast peninsula in Belfalas.\n\nYou have encountered Adîrjan the Brute and should defeat him for the good of the people in Belfalas.
You have encountered Adîrjan the Brute. He wanders about Belfalas murdering innocents and pillaging small homes for amusement.
